price: 1. N’as-tu pas vu ce que fit ton Seigneur aux compagnons de l’Éléphant ?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka bi-aṣḥābi al-fīli
